title: Log-in always into THUNDERBIRD's own Messenger
content: Can anyone tell me how to set up the THUNDERBIRD TO ALWAYS LOG-IN into its own Messenger and avoid the Yahoo's interference with his INADEQUATE Messenger format - this should not be high-science question but I have difficulties to find an information in the HELP-section - thanks, Tony H. ...!
creator: thorsak

title: Move thunderbird to new computer  - is this still valid?
content:

Install Thunderbird on new PC and overwrite the complete folder?

will be the same version of thunderbird.
